title: No Weekly Rotation game mode ?
body: Opened and updated the League Alpha Client ( V0.11-3092139 ) and there's no weekly rotation Hexakill available. Is this not available for a specific reason that we are aware of ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

From what I'm able to see on my end, hexakill appears to be active. (And visible) in the normal client.

http://puu.sh/rKnIp/5e8310a15a.jpg

However I believe the Alpha client does not currently support featured gamemodes.
